data.message: Where is the "thumb down key Facebook promised !"   Need it here!

replies.message: Hi Gary. We've heard feedback that people would like a variety of ways to express themselves. Reactions will allow people to respond to a wide variety of posts shared on Facebook. -Kate
Facebook ...Your a Joke !!! No FREEDOM of speech on FakeBook !!!!!!
Facebook ....Are you Liking the reaction so far ??????   :)
Tony Pellinghelli I agree, no freedom of speech. These 30 somethings are sure touchy.
US constitution isnt appreciated here on facebook :P None of them ....

Are you being prosecuted by the government for your free speech? That's what you have the rights for, PROSECUTION, not for a website to allow you to have everything you want. You just had the "right" to bash facebook for not have a dislike button and then you bash them about "free speech"
Are you seeing the irony of your comments or do I need to type this in a way a squirrel could understand it?

Sam Dykstra with a bloat who is so wise in his own eyes, verbal discourse will probably not penetrate your beard let alone certainly your thick skull!  Just mosey on down the road and concentrate on raising your kids to be lovers and not haters!
They supposedly reviewed the idea of a "thumbs down" icon, but Zuckerberg said he viewed that as a "negative". This sounds a bit PC to me, but who knows?

Hi facebook im 
Seuong Gi Duhoki

I'm happy to have this chance to talk to you. You and I know the negative comments you will receive on Facebook. Before we start. Mitch McConnell said that he would block the President from day one. Now he has said, he will do it again.I am glad he did. Maybe the middle class republicans can see all the obstruction Mitch McConnell has caused. The do nothing congress .He has stopped the middle class from getting ahead. What a shame on them. They can't get out of their own way and let you help the middle class.
The o nly people in America were the American Indians ..until they were robbed of their land by the people
if God was it was there tax on it
God made everyone different u r an idiot.
Naomi Ortiz The Christian God is Sovereign.  like it or not.  God is Sovereign.
